name: MCP Client Tool
semantic_context: Connect tools from an MCP Server
natural_language_description: 这是 MCP Client Tool 节点。主要用于: Connect tools from an MCP Server

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one

sseEndpoint.name: sseEndpoint
sseEndpoint.description: SSE Endpoint of your MCP server
sseEndpoint.natural_language_description: 参数名: SSE Endpoint | 作用: SSE Endpoint of your MCP server | (必填项)

endpointUrl.name: endpointUrl
endpointUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: Endpoint | 作用: Endpoint of your MCP server | (必填项)

serverTransport.name: serverTransport
serverTransport.description: The transport used by your endpoint
serverTransport.natural_language_description: 参数名: Server Transport | 作用: The transport used by your endpoint | 默认值: httpStreamable

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.description: The way to authenticate with your endpoint
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 作用: The way to authenticate with your endpoint | 默认值: none

include.name: include
include.description: How to select the tools you want to be exposed to the AI Agent
include.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tools to Include | 作用: How to select the tools you want to be exposed to the AI Agent | 默认值: all
available_options: All (值: all) - Also include all unchanged fields from the input
Selected (值: selected) - Also include the tools listed in the parameter "Tools to Include"
All Except (值: except) - Exclude the tools listed in the parameter "Tools to Exclude"

includeTools.name: includeTools
includeTools.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
includeTools.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tools to Include | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression | 默认值: []

excludeTools.name: excludeTools
excludeTools.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
excludeTools.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tools to Exclude | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression | 默认值: []

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 作用: Additional options to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for tool calls to finish
